cause.description:
In Ecuador, there is a hospital, Damien House, to help those with Hansen's Disease. Your donation and awareness helps those with this disease, more commonly known as leprosy.
1. Hansen's disease is completely curable, but not everyone can afford treatment.
2. Damien House treats about 760 people with Hansen's disease or leprosy.
3. People who are ill deserve to be treated with dignity.
cause.mission: To Help Those With Hansen's Disease
cause.name: Damien House
